name: SACRIPARTY
description:
Overview

This game was made for Ludum Dare 34, a game jam with the theme: "Sacrifices must be made". The main plot of the game is as follows: you are supposed to die, but, you made a pact with a demon. Instead of taking you, you offer sacrifices for him. But, he already knows who he wants gone. With a brief description of your target, you will have to find him or her in time. The person is dancing in a club filled with other people.

Help us by voting here:

Controls

WASD -> Move

Mouse -> Look Around

Space -> Jump

E -> Interacts with people

F -> Displays your target
